name: Materiality, Objecthood, Connoisseurship and Collecting in the Arts of East Asia
description: Seminar based on firsthand examination of East Asian objects in Toronto collections that attends to the historical processes by which such objects were valued and collected.
prerequisites: FAH260H1/ FAH262H1/ FAH360H1/ FAH363H1/ FAH364H1/ FAH368H1/ EAS211Y0/ EAS227Y/ EAS233H1/ EAS237Y1/ EAS305Y1/ EAS331Y1; permission of instructor
